main event: A round, luminous UFO was observed for 45 minutes at an altitude of 45,000 feet in Porto Alegre, Brazil.
interesting points: The sighting was witnessed by a FAB (Brazilian Air Force) major who has been close to FAB's investigation of flying saucer sightings.
The FAB has on file various photographs of these objects, and an effort will be made to obtain examples for forwarding.
FAB personnel have reported numerous sightings by Brazilian airline pilots, some of whom claim to have been very close to these objects.
The FAB has records of sightings as far back as the early 1800's, which by their descriptions resembled a landing by one of these objects.
witnesses: FAB (Brazilian Air Force) personnel, including a major
photographs: yes, the report indicates the FAB has photographs of these objects
